name: Add and Update JustCall contacts to a Google Spreadsheets
description: Every time a new contact is added to JustCall, Make will automatically add that contact to a new row in a Google Sheets spreadsheet or update an existing row. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/13VfUZ1QFJQqX0BywkIdQigcgJyP_Hz9zJ-tLhqjlth0/edit?usp=sharing).
